analyzed: ī t ū t e t dvivacanam pragṛhyam

an eka a l ś it sarvasya

na pada anta dvirvacana vare ya lopa svara savarṇa anusvāra dīrgha ja s ca r vidhiṣu

svam rūpam śabdasya a śabda saṃjñā
a ṇ u t it savarṇasya ca a pratyayaḥ

ra laḥ u i upadhā tha l ādeḥ san ca
ū kālaḥ a c hrasva dīrgha plutaḥ
yajña karmaṇi a japa nyūṛ kha sāmasu
eka vibhakti ca a ūru a nipāte
arthavat a dhātuḥ a pratyayaḥ prātipadikam
tat a śiṣyam saṃjñā pramāṇa tvāt
yoga pramāṇe ca tad abhāve adarśanam syāt
pradhāna pratyaya artha vacanam arthasya anya pramāṇa tvāt
tiṣya punarvasvoḥ nakṣatra dvaṃdve bahuvacanasya dvivacanam nityam

napuṃsakam a napuṃsakena ekavata asi anyatarasyām
grāmya paśu saṃgheṣu a taruṇeṣu strī
sam ava pra vibhyaḥ s taḥ

ni sam upa vi hhyaḥ hvaḥ
gandhana avakṣepaṇa sevana sāhasikya pratiyatna prakathana aupayogeṣu kṛñaḥ

original: 1.03.067 Ṇer aṆau yat karma Ṇau cet sa kartā anādhyāne

s ḥ ādi ṣu a sarva namaḥ sthāne

original: 1.04.106 prahāse ca manya=upapade manyater uttama ekavat=ca
analyzed: prahāse ca manya aupapade manyateḥ uttamaḥ ekavat ca
sup āmantrite para aṛga vat svare
avyayam vibhakti samīpa samṛddhi vyṛddhi artha abhāva atyaya a samprati śabda prādurbhāva paścātyathā ānupūrvya yaugapadya sādṛśya sampatti sākalya anta vacaneṣu
dvitīyā śrita atīta patita gata atyasta prāpta āpannaiḥ
pūrva sadṛśa sama ūna artha kalaha nipuṇa miśra ślakṣṇaiḥ
caturthī tad artha artha bali hita sukha rakṣitaiḥ
apeta apoḍha mukta patita apatrastaiḥ alpaśas
stoka antika dūra artha kṛcchrāṇi ktena
pūrva kāla eka sarva jarat purāṇa nava kevalāḥ samān adhikaraṇena
taddhita artha auttara pada samāhāre ca
upamitam vyāghra ābibhiḥ sāmānya a prayoge
pūrva apara prathama carama jaghanya samāna madhya madhyama vīrāḥ ca
sat mahat parama auttama autkrṣṭāḥ pūjya manaiḥ
poṭā yuvati stoka katipaya gṛṣṭi dhenu vaśā vehat baṣkayaṇī pravaktṛ śrotriya adhyāpaka dhūrtaiḥ jātiḥ
pūrva apara adh a ra auttaram eka deśi nāka adhikaraṇe
pūraṇa guṇa su hita artha sata vyaya tavya samān adhikaraṇena
saṃkhyayā avyaya āsanna adūra adhika saṃkhyāḥ saṃkhyeye

anya āra titara ṛte diś śabda anc ḥ uttara pada āca āhi ukte

original: 3.03.116 karmaṇ-i ca y-ena saṃ-spraś-āt kart-uḥ śarīra-sukha-m
analyzed: karmaṇi ca yena saṃspraśāt kartuḥ śarīra sukham

īṣat dus suṣu kṛcchra akṛcchra artheṣu khal
na an adyatana vat kriyā prabandha sāmīpyayoḥ
kāla vibhāge ca an ahar rātrāṇām
an avakḷpti amarṣayoḥ a kiṃvṛtte api
vibhāṣā dhātau sambhāvanā acane a yadi
vidhi nimantraṇa āmantraṇa adhiiṣṭa sampraśna praarthaneṣu liṅ

loṭaḥ hi svau vā ca ta dhvamoḥ
tum arthe se sen ase asen kse kasen adhyai adhyain kadhyai kadhyain śadhyai śadhyain tavai taveṅ tavenaḥ

na kroḍa ādi bahu a caḥ
jāteḥ a strī viṣaya atayā aupadhāt

a vṛddhābhyaḥ nadī mānuṣī hyaḥ anāmikā hyaḥ

original: 4.02.057 tad a-syām pra-har-aṇa-m iti krīḍā-yām Ṇa-ḥ
analyzed: tat asyām praharaṇam iti krīḍāyām ṇaḥ
ghañaḥ sā asyām kriyā iti ñaḥ
kratu uktha ādi sūtra antā tṭhak
tat asmin asti iti deśe tad nāmni
matoḥ ca bahu a ca ṛgāt
vuñ chaṇ ka ṭha cila saini ra ḍhañ ṇya ya phak phiñ iñ ñya kak ṭhakaḥ arīhaṇa kṛśāśva ṛśya kumuda kāśa tṛṇa prekṣā aśman
sakhi saṃkāśa balapakṣa karṇa sutaṃgama pragadin varāha kumuda ādibhyaḥ
ran koḥ a manuṣya iaṇ ca
dyu prāca pācu dac pratīcaḥ yat
tīra rūpya auttara padāt añ ñau
diś pūrva pada ata saṃjñā ayam ñaḥ
udīcya grāmāt ca bahu a caḥ anta audāttāt
prastha auttara pada paladī ādika padhā taṇ
na dvi a caḥ prācya bharateṣu
a vṛddha ā tapi bahuvacana viṣayāt
kaccha agni vaktra varttat tara padāt
vṛddha ātaka eka ant ā t kha aupadhāt
kanthā palada nagara grāma hrada a uttara padāt
para avara adhama auttama pūrvāt ca
grāma janapada eka deśa ātañ ṭhañu
saṃdhi velā ādi ṛtu nakṣatre hi aṇ
sarvatra aṇ ca ta lopaḥ ca
sāyam ciram prāhṇe prage avyaya ihyaḥ ṭyu ṭyulau tuṭ ca
pūrvāhṇa aparāhṇa ārdrā mūla pradoṣa avaskara ātvun
śraviṣṭhā phalgunī anurādhā svāti tiṣya punarvasu hasta viśākhā aṣāḍhā bahulāt luk
upa jānu upa karṇa upa nī vesṭhak
dṛti kukṣi kalaśi vasti asti aheḥ ḍhañ
bahu a caḥ anta au dā ttāt ṭhañ
dvi a c ṛt brāhmaṇa ṛc prathama adhvara puraḥcaraṇa nāma ākhyātāt ṭhak
śiśu kranda yama sabha dvaṃdva aindrajanana ādibhyaḥ chaḥ
tūdī śala āturavarmatī kūcavārāt ḍhak chaṇ ḍhañ yakaḥ
a cittāt a deśa kālāt ṭhak
gotra kṣatriya ākhye hyaḥ ahulam vuñ

original: 4.03.100 jana-padin-āṃ jana-pada-vat sarvaṃ jana-pad-ena samāna-śabdā-nām bahu-vacan-e
analyzed: janapadinām janapada vat sarvam janapadena samāna śabdānām bahuvacane
tittiri vara tantu khaṇḍikā okhāt chaṇ
pārāśarya śila ālibhyām bhikṣu naṭa sūtrayoḥ
saṃgha a ṛka lakṣaṇa iṣu añi añ iñām aṇ
maya ṭvā etayoḥ bhāṣāyām a bhakṣya ācchādanayoḥ
kaṃsīya para śavyayoḥ yañ añau luk ca
bahu a c pūrva padāt ṭhac
nau vayaḥ dharma visa mūla mūla sītā tulā abhyasta ārya tulya prāpya vadhya ānāmya sama samita sammiteṣu
mata jana ha lāt karaṇa jalpa karṣesu
sa garbha sa yūtha sa nu tā atyan

original: 4.04.125 tad-vān ā-sām upa-dhā-n-o mantra=iti iṣṭakā-su luK ca matO-ḥ
analyzed: tadvān āsām upadhānaḥ mantra eti iṣṭakāsu luk ca matoḥ
pūrvaiḥ kṛtam i n yau ca
khala yava māṣa tila vṛṣa brahmaṇs ca
ātman viśva jana bhogattara adāt khaḥ
tat asya tat asmin syāt iti
ā arha ata go puccha saṃkhyā pari āṇ ātṭhak
śatāt ca ṭhani atu a śate
saṃkhyāyāḥ ati śat t tāyāḥ kan
adhi ardha pūrva dvigoḥ luk a aṃjñā āām
paṇa pāda māṣa śata a tat
go dvi a caḥ a saṃkhyā pari āṇa aśva deḥ yat
sarva bhūmi pṛthivī bhyām aṇ añau
tat asmin vṛddhi āya lābha śulka opadāḥ dīate
paṛkti viṃśati triṃśat catvāriṃśat pañcāśat ṣaṣṭi saptati aśīti navati śatam
triṃśat catvāriṃśatoḥ brāhmaṇe saṃjñā āām ḍaṇ
tatra ca dīyate kāryam bhava vat
tena yathā kathāca hasta āhyām ṇa yatau
ā kāli kaṭa ādi anta vacane
na nañ pūrvāt tatpuruṣa a ta catura saṃgata lavaṇa vaṭa yudha kata rasa lasebhyaḥ
prāṇabhṛt jāti vayaḥ vacana audgātṛ ādi hyaḥ añ
i k antāt ca laghu pūrvāt
gotra caraṇāt ślāghā atyākāra tad veteṣu
vibhāṣā tila māṣa oma ābha ṛga a ṇuhyaḥ
anupada sarva anna aya anayam baddhā bhakṣayati neyeṣu
tasya pāka mūle pīlu adi karṇa ādihyaḥ kuṇap jāhacau
vi nañbhyām nā nāñau na saha
nate nāsikāyāḥ saṃjñā ṭīṭac nāṭac bhrāṭacaḥ
ina c piṭa cika ci ca
tat asya saṃjātam tārakā ādibhyaḥ itac
dvi tribhyām taya ya ya cvā

original: 5.02.045 tad a-sminn adhi-ka-m iti daśa=nt-āt Ḍa-ḥ
analyzed: tat asmin adhikam iti daśa antāt ḍaḥ
na anta a ta saṃkhyā ādeḥ maṭ
nityam śata ādi māsa ardha māsa sam atsarāt ca
ṣaṣṭi ādeḥ ca a saṃkhyā ādeḥ
ayaḥ śūla daṇḍa jina āhyām ṭhak ṭhañau
indriyam indralingam indradṛṣṭam indraṛṣṭam indrauṣṭam indraattam iti vā
tat asya asti asmin iti matup
prajñā śraddhā arcā vṛtti hyaḥ ṇaḥ
jyotsnā tamisrā śṛṛgṇa ūrja sinūrja sala gomin malina malīmasāḥ
dvaṃdva aupatāpa garhyāt pra aṇithāt iniḥ
bala ādibhyaḥ matup nya a rayām
kam śam hyām ba bha yus ti tu ta yasaḥ
sarva eka anya kim yad tadaḥ kāle dā
sadyasparut parāri aiṣamasparedya viadya pūrvedyus anyedyus anyataredyus itaredyus aparedyus adharedyus ubhayedyus uttaredyus
diś śabdebhyaḥ saptamī pañcamī prathamā hyaḥ diś deśa kāla iṣu astātiḥ
pūrva a dha ra au arānām asi pura dhavaḥ ca eṣām
eka a t dhas dhya muñ nya ara yām
eka a t āk it ca a sahāye
dvivacana vibhajya pa pade tara pīya sunau
īṣat a samāptau kalpap deśya deśīyaraḥ
avyaya sarvanāmnām a ka c prāk ṭeḥ
bahu a caḥ manuṣyanāmnaḥ ṭha c vā
prācām upa ādeḥ aṭ a cvucau ca
ajina antasya auttara adaḥ opaḥ ca
ṭha a c ādau ūrdhvam dviīya a t caḥ
śevala supari viśāla varuṇa aryamana ādīnām tṛtīyāt
kim yad tadaḥ nirhāraṇe dvayoḥ ekasya ḍatarac
pratna pūrva viśva emāt thā l chandasi
āyudha jīvi saṃghātñī aṭāhīkeṣu a brāhmaṇa rājanyāt
parśu ādi yaudheya ādihyām aṇ añau
abhijit vidabhṛt śālāvat śikhāvat śamīvat ūrṇāvat śruma taṇaḥ yañ
pāda śatasya saṃkhyā ādeḥ vīpsāyām vun lopaḥ ca
a ṣaṣ a k sa āśi taṃgu alam karma na lam puruṣa adhyuttara padāt khaḥ
sthāna anta a tu vibhāṣā sa sthānena eti ced
kim e t tiṅ avyaya ghāta a mu ara vyara arṣe
vibhāṣā bahoḥ dhā vi praṛṣṭa kāle
vṛka jyeṣṭha ahyām tiltātilau ca chandasi
bahu alpa artha āt śas kārakāt anya arayām
atigraha a vyathana kṣepeṣu a kartari tṛtīyāyāḥ
kṛ bhū asti yoge sampadi a artari cviḥ
aru smanaḥ cakṣuḥ cetaḥ rahaḥ rajasām lopaḥ ca
deva manuṣya puruṣa puru martya ihyaḥ dvitīyā aptayoḥ bahulam
avyakta anukaraṇa ātvia cvara ardhāt an itau ḍāc
kṛñaḥ dvitīya tṛtīya śamba bījāt kṛṣau
bahu rīhau saṃkhyeye ḍac a bahu gaṇāt
ṛc purap dhur pathām a a nakṣe

acatur avicatur asucatura strī uṃsa dhenu naḍuha ṛ kāma vāṛa nasā akṣi bhruva dāragava ūru ṣṭhīva padaṣṭhīva naktaṃivara triṃdiva ahar divasa rajasa niḥśreyasa puruṣa āyusa dvyāyuṣa tryāyuṣa ṛgajuṣa jātokṣa mahokṣa vṛddhokṣa aupaśuna goṣṭha śvāḥ
ahan sarva eka deśa saṃkhyāta puṇyāt ca rātreḥ
dvaṃdvāt cu t aṣa hantāt sam āāre
bahuvrīhau sakthi akṣṇoḥ su aṛgāt ṣac
a c nāsikāyāḥ saṃjñāyām nasam ca a sthūle
su prāta su śva su diva śāri kukṣa caturaśra eṇīpada aja pada proṣṭha adāḥ
nañ dus su hyaḥ ha li sakthyoḥ anyatarayām
gandhasya i t u t pūti su surabhihyaḥ
agra anta śuddha śubhra vṛṣa varāha ihi asa
vaci svapi yaja ādinām k iti
grahi jyā vayi vyadhi vaṣṭi vicati vṛścati pṛchhati bhṛjjatīnām ṅ iti ca
vas ca asya anyatarasyām k iti
ā taḥ caḥ upadeśe a ś iti
sṛji dṛśoḥ jha li am k iti
anudāttasya ca ṛ t padhasya anyatarasyām
pad dat nas mās hṛd niś asan yūṣan doṣan yakan śakan udan āsan śas prabhṛtiṣu
ha l ṅī āp yaḥ dīrghāt su ti si apṛktam ha l
e ṅaḥ pada anta ā tati
a taḥ roḥ a pluta a ta plute
prakṛtyā a antar pādam a vi apare
av yātavat yātavakra musa vrata ayama vantu au asyuṣu
āpaḥ jusāṇaḥ vṛṣṇaḥ varṣiṣṭhe ambe ambāle ambike pūrve
i kaḥ a savarṇe śākalyasya hrasvaḥ s ca
etad tadoḥ su lopaḥ a koḥ a nañ samāse ha li
saḥ a ci lope ced pāda pūraṇam
sau eka a caḥ tṛtīyā ādiḥ vibhaktiḥ
anta datta a t ittara pada āt nyatarayām anitya a māse
añceḥ chandasi a sarva āma sthāne
ūṭhi dampad ādi ap pum rai dyubhyaḥ
śatuḥ an umaḥ nadī a c ādī
udātta ya ṇaḥ ha l pūrvāt
ṣaṣ tri caturbhyaḥ ha l ādiḥ
na go śvan sau avarṇa rāja ṛ kru ṛ kṛdbhyaḥ
tāsi anudātta et ṅ ita t upadeśāt la sārvadhātukam anudāttam a hnu iṅoḥ
svapa ādi hiṃsām a c ia n iṭi
bhī hrī bhṛ hu mada jana dhana daridrā jāgarām pūrvam p iti
tha li ca sa iṭi iṭ antaḥ vā
niṣṭhā ca dvi a c an ā t
īḍa vanda vṛ śaṃsa duhām ṇyataḥ
tyāga rāga hāsa kuha śvaṭha krathānām
matoḥ pūrvam ā t saṃjñāyām striyām
tatpuruṣe tulya artha tṛtīyā saptamī upamāna avyaya dvitīyā kṛtyāḥ
savidha sanīḍa samaryāda saveśa sadeśeṣu sāmīpye
śra jya avama kan pāpavatsu bhāve karmadhāraye
i k anta kāla kapāla bhagāla śarāveṣu dvigau
saptamī siddha śuṣka pakva bandha iṣu a kālāt
pari prati upa apāḥ varjyamāna ahar rātra vayaveṣu
mahān vrīhi aparāhṇa gṛṣṭi iṣvāsa jābāla bhāra bhārata hailihila raurava pravṛddheṣu
kurugārhapata riktaguru asūtajaratī aślīladṛḍharūpā pārevaḍavā taittilakadrūḥ paṇya ambalaḥ āsībhārāṇām ca
ta ādau ca n iti kṛti a tau
an i kantaḥ añcatau va pratyaye
dīrgha kāśa tuṣa bhrāṣṭra vaṭam je
prasthe a vṛddham a karkī ādīnām
a rme ca a varṇam dvi a c tri a c
na bhūta adhika saṃjīva madra aśman kajjalam
diś śabdāḥ grāma janapada ākhyāna cānarāṭeṣu
ādi udāttam dvi a c chandasi
kūla tīra tūla mūla śālā akṣa samam avyayībhāve
kaṃsa mantha śūrpa pāyya kāṇḍam dvigau
śiteḥ nitya a bahu cahuvrīhau abha sad
na auttara pade anudātta ādau a pṛthivī rudra pūṣan manthiṣu
tha atha ghañ kta aca pitra kāṇām
man ktin vyākhyāna śayana āsana sthāna yājaka ādi krītāḥ
miśram ca an upasargam a saṃdhau
ya yatoḥ ca a tad arthe
bahuvrīhau idam etad tadhyaḥ prathama pūraṇayoḥ kriyā gaṇane
na avyaya diś śabda go mahat sthūla muṣṭi pṛthu vatsebhyaḥ
jāti kāla sukha ādibhyaḥ an ācchādanāt ktaḥ a kṛta mita pratipannāḥ
upāt dvi a c a jinam a gaura ādayaḥ
dvi tribhyām pad dat mūrdhasu bahuvrīhau
ha l a t antāt saptamyāḥ saṃjñāyām
kāra nāmni ca prācām ha l ādau
a mūrdhan mastakāt sva aṛgāt a kāme
ṛ taḥ vidyā yoni sambandha ihyaḥ

original: 6.03.034 striy-āḥ puṃ-vat=hāṣ-i-ta-puṃsk-āt an-ūṄ sa-mā-na=adhi-kar-aṇ-e striy-ām a-pūr-aṇī-priyā=ādi-ṣu
analyzed: striyāḥ an ūṅ samāna adhikaraṇe striyām a pūraṇī priyā ādiṣu
vṛddhi nimittasya ca taddhitasya a rakta vikāre
sva aṛga āt ca ī taḥ a mānini
gha rūpa kalpa celaṭ bruva gotra mata hateṣu ṅ yaḥ aneka a caḥ hrasvaḥ
dvi aṣṭanaḥ saṃkhyāyām a bahuvrīhi aśītyoḥ
eka ha l ādau pūrayitavya inya a rayām
mantha odana saktu bindu vajra bhāra hāra vīvadha gāheṣu ca
iṣṭakā iṣīkā mālānām cita tūla bhāriṣu
a rus dviṣa tac ntasya mum
i caḥ eka a caḥ m r atyaya ata
nabhrāj napātna veda snāsatyā namuci nakula nakha napuṃsaka nakṣatra nakra nākeṣu prakṛtyā
eka ādiḥ ca ekasya ca āduk
na gaḥ a prāṇi ṣu nya a rayām
gotra rūpa sthāna varṇa vayaḥ vacana bandhuṣu
viṣvañc devayoḥ ca ṭeḥ adri añcatau va pratyaye
dvi antar upasarga īhyaḥ apaḥ ī t
a ṣaṣṭhī a tṛtīya stha sya nyasya du kāśi sā śā āsthā āsthita autsuka ūti kāraka rāga cheṣu
koḥ kat tatpuruṣa e a ci
saṃkhyā vi sāya ūrvasya ahnasya ahan anyatarasyām ṅau
ḍh ra lope pūrvasya dīrghaḥ ṇaḥ
maṇi bhinna chinna chidra sruva svastikasya
nahi vṛti vṛṣi vyadhi ruci sahi taniṣu kvau
vana giryoḥ saṃjñāyām koṭara kiṃśulaka ādīnām
matau bahu a caḥ an ajira ādīnām
mantre soma aśva aindriya viśva evyaya matau
oḥ sadheḥ ca vibhaktau a prathamāām
ṛci tu nu gha makṣu taṅ ku tra auruṣyāṇām
dvi a caḥ a taḥ tiṅaḥ
aptṛntṛc svasṛ naptṛ neṣṭṛ tvaṣṭṛ kṣattṛ hotṛ potṛ praśāst ṝṇām
a tu a santasya ca a dhātoḥ
anunāsikasya kvi jha loḥ k ṅ iti
c śvoḥ śū ṭha nunāsike ca
jvar tvara sri vi avi mavām upa ha ayāḥ ca
an iti tām ha laḥ upadhāyāḥ k ṅ iti
dan śḥ san jḥ svan jām śapi
anudātta aupadeśavanati tanoti ādīnām jha li k ṅ iti
vi ṭ vanoḥ anunāsikasya ā t
janḥ sanḥ khanām san jha loḥ
sanaḥ ktici lopaḥ ca asi anya arayām
bhrasjaḥ ra upadhayoḥ ram anya a rayām
ay ām anta ālu āy yaitnu iṣṇuṣu

original: 6.04.062 sya-siC-sīyuṬ-tāsi-su bhāv-a-kar-maṇ-oḥ upa-deś-e aC=hanḥ-grahA-dṛś-āṃ CiṆ-vat=iṬ ca
analyzed: sya sic sīyuṭ tāsisu bhāva karmaṇoḥ upadeśe a chanḥ graha dṛśām ciṇvatiṭ ca
dīṅaḥ yu ṭaci k ṅ iti
ghuma ā sthā gā pā jahā ti sām ha li
luṅ liṅ lṛṅ kṣu aṭ udāttaḥ
bahulam chandasi am āṅ yoge api
a ci śnu dhātu bhruvām y voḥ iyaṅ unaṅau
eḥ an eka a caḥ a saṃoga ūrvasya
cha ādeḥ ghe a dvi upasargasya
gama hanḥ jana khana ghasām lopaḥ k ṅ iti an aṅi
śru śṛṇu pṝ kṛ vṛbhyaḥ chandasi
u taḥ ca pratyaya āta saṃyoga ūrvāt
lopaḥ ca asya anyatarasyām m voḥ
ghu asoḥ e thau bhyāsa opaḥ ca
a taḥ eka ha l madhye anādeśa ādeḥ liṭi
na śasa dada vā ādi guṇāṇām
ṣa pūrva han dhṛta rājñām aṇi
sūrya tiṣya agastya matsyānām yaḥ upadhāyāḥ
hrasva kṣipra kṣudrāṇām ya ṇ ādi param pūrvasya ca guṇaḥ
priya sthira sphira auru bahula guru vṛddha tṛpra dīrgha vṛndārakāṇām prastha spha var baṃhi garva ṛṣi trapdra aghivṛndāḥ
raḥ ṛ taḥ ha l ādeḥ laghoḥ
i t a ṇi an apatye
na ma pūrvaḥ apatye a varmaṇaḥ
dāṇḍināyana hāstināyana ātharvaṇika jaihmāśineya vāsineya nibhrauṇahatya dhaivatya sārava aikṣvāka maitreya hiraṇmayāni
ṛtvya vāstvya vāstva mādhvī hiraṇyayāni chandasi
āyan ey īn īy iyaḥ pha ḍha kha cha ghām pratyaya ādīnām
na edam a dasoḥ a koḥ
ṭā ṅasi ṅasām ina āt syāḥ
tu hyoḥ tātaṅ āśiṣi nya arayām
samāse a nañ pūrve ktvaḥ lyap
supām su luk pūrva savarṇa ā āt śeyā ḍā ḍyāyāc ālaḥ
aśva kṣīra vṛṣa lavaṇānām ātma prītau kyaci
u k it acām sarvanāmasthāne a dhātoḥ
tṛtīyā ādiṣu bhāṣita puṃskāt pum vat ālavasya
asthi dadhi sakthi akṣṇām anaṅ udāttaḥ
vadḥ vrajḥ ha l antasya a caḥ
h m y anta kṣaṇa śvasḥ jāgṛ ṇi śvi e t tām
a taḥ ha l ādeḥ laghoḥ
ti tu tra ta tha si su sara ka seṣu ca
kṛ sṛ bhṛ vṛ stu dru sru śruvaḥ liṭi
kṣubdha svānta dhvānta lagna mliṣṭa viribdha phāṇṭa bāḍhāni mantha manaḥ tamaḥ sakta avispaṣṭa svara anāyāsa bhṛśeṣu
vā dānta śānta pūrṇa dasta spaṣṭa channa jñaptāḥ
ruṣi am ḥ tvara sam ghuṣa ā svanām
grasita skabhita stabhita uttabhita catta vikasta viśastṛ śaṃstṛ śāstṛ tarutṛ tarūtṛ varutṛ varūtṛ varutrīḥ ujjvaliti kṣariti kṣamiti vamiti amiti iti ca
ti iṣ saha lubhḥ ruṣa riṣaḥ
sani iv anta ṛdha bhrasja dan bhu śri svṛ yu ūrṇu bhara jñapi sanām
sa i a sici kṛta cṛta chṛda tṛda nṛtaḥ
a caḥ tas vat thal ian iṭaḥ nityam
vasu eka a c ā t ghasām
yam ḥ rama nam ā tām sak ca
smi pūṅ ṛan jū aśām sani
kekaya mitrayu pralayānām ya ādeḥ iyaḥ

original: 7.03.003 na y-vā-bhyām pada=antā-bhyām pūrv-au tu tā-bhyām aiC
analyzed: na y vābhyām pada antābhyām pūrvau tu tābhyām ai c
hṛd bhaga sindhu ante pūrva adaya ca
ja ṛ gala dhenu vala ja antasya vibhāṣitam uttaram
nañaḥ śuci īśvara kṣetrajña kuśala nipuṇānām
na audātta aupadeśasya mantaya an āameḥ
arti hrī vlī rī knūyī ksmāyī ā tām pu kṇau
śā chā sā hvā vyā vepām yuk
lī loḥ nuk lukau nya arayām sneha e pātane

original: 7.03.044 praty-ay-a-sth-āt k-āt pūrva-sya=T-aḥ iT āP-i a-sUP-aḥ
analyzed: pratyaya sthāt kāt pūrvasya taḥ i t āpi a supaḥ
udīcām ā taḥ sthāne ya ka pūrvāyāḥ
bhastrā eṣā ajā ajñā dvāsvā nañ ūrvāṇām api
is us u ta antāt kaḥ
ca joḥ ku ghi t ṇyatoḥ
yaja yāca ruca pravac ṛcaḥ ca
lukvā duha diha liha guhām ātmaneade dantye
pā ghrā dhmā sthā mnā dāṇ dṛśi arti sarti śada sadām piba jighra dhama ti stha mana yaccha paśya ṛccha dhau śīya sīdāḥ
jāgraḥ a vi ciṇ ṇal ṅ itsu
na abhyastasya a ci p iti sārvadhātuke
u taḥ vṛddhiḥ luki ha li
tu ru stu śami amaḥ sārvadhātuke
na a c lopin śās ḥ ṛ ti tām

original: 8.02.042 ra-dā-bhyāṃ niṣṭhā-t-aḥ na-ḥ pūrva-sya tu d-aḥ
